name: Industrial and Factorial Addons for KingComposer
author: themebon

sections.description:
This plugin works best with Industrue Theme – 100% Free

You can build amazing professional industrial and factorial websites with tons of powerfull addons. 33+ addons with one plugin.

Live Demo | Theme Download

Features

  • 100% Responsive all elements
  • Super easy Installation.
  • Unlimited Colors.
  • Tons of customization options.
  • Powerfull Shortcodes.
  • SEO friendly.
  • Easy user interface.
  • Works with any theme.
  • All Major browser supported.
sections.installation:
Installing this plugin as regular wordpress plugin. First you need to install King Composer Page Builder plugin then install Essential WPBakery Page Builder.

This addon plugin works like other page builder addon plugin. Go to new page then click on WPBakery Page builder then click on Add Element you should see VC Addons menu as Name “VC Addons” on Menu Top, click on it you will see shortcode item list.
